Name: team_size_limit
Description: The team size must not exceed 9 members

Name: project_budget_limit
Description: The project budget must not be exceeded

Name: sprint_duration_fixed
Description: The sprint duration must be exactly 2 weeks

Name: worker_availability
Description: Workers must be available during the sprint

Name: feature_priority
Description: Only high-priority features can be selected for the sprint

Name: blocker_resolution
Description: All critical blockers must be resolved before sprint end

Name: velocity_trend_positive
Description: The velocity trend must be positive

Name: release_plan_status
Description: Only approved release plans can be executed

Name: scrum_master_experience
Description: The Scrum Master must have at least 2 years of experience

Name: epic_status
Description: Only "ready" epics can be split into user stories

Name: user_story_points_limit
Description: User stories must not exceed 8 story points
